channel.title: Grades and Credits :: AD3 Homepage
channel.description: Grades and Credits The two assignments are worth 2 higher-education credits (ECTS credits). The assignment grade is as follows where $a_i$ is the final score of assignment $i$. Grade Condition 5 $18 \leq a_1 + a_2 \leq 20$, no problem score $0$, guest lecture attened and $a_1,a_2 \geq 3$. 4 $14 \leq a_1 + a_2 \leq 17$, no problem score $0$, guest lecture attened and $a_1,a_2 \geq 3$. 3 $10 \leq a_1 + a_2 \leq 13$, no problem score $0$, guest lecture attened and $a_1,a_2 \geq 3$. A missed guest lecture (in case of no force majeure) can be compensated for by a summary of a research paper chosen by the head teacher.
